text: Ezɨ me uari akuvazir dughiamɨn, me an azara, “Ekiam, nɨ dughiar kam atrivim Israel danightɨma, a ua Israelɨn nguazimɨn ganam, o?”1:6 Fomɨra Israelɨn gumazir maba uari atrivimɨn ikia uan nguazimɨn gari. Egha Iesusɨn dughiamɨn Israelia Romɨn apengan iti. Ezɨ Iesus dughiar kamɨn otogha aruima, gumazir avɨriba kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, a Romɨn gavman batueghɨva uabɨ Israelian ganam. Eghtɨ gɨn Israel Kantrin igharaziba dar ganɨva egh dar apengan ikian kogham.
